Title: Seeing Red
Plot: The Ice Truck Killer is back. He leaves a crime scene that brings back some horrifying repressed memories for Dexter. Paul sues Rita for sole custody of Astor and Cody.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Teddy Lane Jr., Symba Smith, Romeo Brown, Maxwell Huckabee, Christina Robinson, Malcolm-Jamal Warner, Daniel Goldman, Wiley Pickett, Christine Barger, Katherine Kirkpatrick, Jennifer Shon, Roxanne Beckford
